sentences.sentence: I have a violent fit of croupy coughing.
sentences.translation: 时常会有一阵子哮吼性咳嗽。

sentences.sentence: The kids beg for it when they get a cough. It tastes that good. And it works great! It even gets rid of croupy coughs!
sentences.translation: 孩子媚苋嗽时总是来讨这个喝，口感很好，同时后果特棒！以至对义膜性的咳嗽也无效果！
